title: Dried Fruits & Almonds Mix
text: This delightful combination brings together the natural sweetness of dried fruits with the crunchy richness of almonds. Each bite offers a perfect balance of flavors and textures: soft, chewy dried fruits complement the nutty, satisfying crunch of almonds...

title: Armenian sweet sujukh
text: Armenian sweet sujukh is a traditional treat made from nuts threaded on a string and coated in a thickened grape must, creating a chewy, sweet snack. Typically, walnuts, hazelnuts, or almonds are used, which are carefully strung together and then dipped repeatedly in a mixture of grape juice and flour until a glossy, caramel-like coating forms. Once dried, it becomes a long, rope-like candy that is both nutritious and indulgent.

title: Round Sujukh ))
text: Round sujukh is a traditional Armenian sweet made by coating nuts—usually walnuts, almonds, or hazelnuts—in a thickened grape juice mixture, forming a chewy, flavorful candy. Unlike the typical long, rope-like sujukh, the round variety is shaped into small, bite-sized balls, making it perfect for snacking or gifting.
